idea-plugin.name: Uniflow Client
idea-plugin.description:
Uniflow plugin.
Jetbrains Client for Uniflow. Unified Workflow Automation Tool. Uniflow allows you to create your own Flows, in order to workflow and automate your daily tasks by using Jetbrains Plugins. By using Uniflow Jetbrains Client, you will benefit browser automation built on top Jetbrains Plugin environment. To connect you account to Uniflow : go to Tools -> Uniflow. Add your API key that you set on your account at https://uniflow.io/settings. More usage exemples can be found on https://uniflow.io
